name: M.W.A
description:
In "M.W.A", you play as a man who has lost their favorite colors. In order to find your colors, you must go through strange portals that are appearing throughout the land, taking you to different dimensions and worlds alike. While searching, you curiously come across creatures, and quickly realize that they are hostile to anyone outside of their world. Armed with your trusty gun, fight your way to the colors, collect them, and escape with color!

Contributions:

Louis - Technical Programmer

Sheel - Level Designer, Technical Programmer

Zac - Sound Effect/Music Lead, Lead Artist
